survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Sustainable Packaging Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and behaviors regarding sustainable packaging in retail and e-commerce.

questions.question_text: How important is sustainable packaging to you when making a purchase?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure importance levels.

script.question_text: How important is sustainable packaging to you when making a purchase?

questions.question_text: Which types of sustainable packaging are you most familiar with? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: I am not familiar with any of these
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to gauge awareness levels.

script.question_text: Which types of sustainable packaging are you most familiar with? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: I am not familiar with any of these

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for products with sustainable packaging?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to measure willingness to pay.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for products with sustainable packaging?

questions.question_text: What factors influence your preference for sustainable packaging? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify key influencing factors.

script.question_text: What factors influence your preference for sustainable packaging? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please share any additional thoughts or suggestions regarding sustainable packaging.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights.
